name: Space Talisman
overview: An early version of Hero of the Golden Talisman, which is quite a bit different, featuring different music, screens, enemies and a rather bizarre swimming animation! It was leaked to the scene and has been floating around under a number of different pseudonyms including "Labyrinth" and "Progfine" at one point. Published in Italy as Minaccia al Mondo in Logica 2000 n.18 (Marzo 1986).
